purgeSuccessful.description: Successfully purged your data from the database.

nextServerAnniversary.description: **{{SERVER}}**'s anniversary is on **{{DATE}}**. It will be turning **{{YEARS}}**!

description: Success! {{USER}}'s birthday has been set to **{{BIRTHDAY}}, {{TIMEZONE}}**
**Important Note:** Birthdays are stored globally. This means your birthday is now set for all servers with Birthday Bot!

requiredSetup.title: Server Setup - Completed
description: You have successfully completed the required server setup!

dateFormatSet: Successfully updated the server's date format setting to `{{SETTING}}`!
This is how birthdays will be detected in this server!
nameFormatSet: Successfully updated the server's name format setting to `{{SETTING}}`!
Names will now appear in this format: **{{FORMAT}}**
successEmbeds.defaultTimeZoneSet: Successfully set your server's default timezone to **{{TIMEZONE}}**!
successEmbeds.useTimeZoneSettingSet: Birthdays will now be celebrated based on the {{OPTION}}'s timezone!
successEmbeds.defaultTimeCleared: Successfully cleared your server's default timezone!
successEmbeds.trustedPreventsMessageYes: Trusted Role is now required for the birthday message!
successEmbeds.trustedPreventsMessageNo: Trusted Role is now not required for the birthday message!
successEmbeds.trustedPreventsRoleYes: Trusted Role is now required for the birthday role!
successEmbeds.trustedPreventsRoleNo: Trusted Role is now not required for the birthday role!
successEmbeds.requireAllTrustedYes: To have their birthday celebrated users now require all the trusted roles!
successEmbeds.requireAllTrustedNo: To have their birthday celebrated users now require only one of the trusted roles!
